column3: sad all the time since my friend groot blew up i have vivid nightmares and flashbacks and freeze up when i hear loud noises
column4: Summary: Based on the patient's self-reported symptoms, it is likely that they are suffering from post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD). The patient has been feeling sad for a long time, experiencing nightmares and flashbacks, and being easily startled by loud noises. A human provider should conduct a more thorough evaluation to confirm the diagnosis and provide appropriate treatment options.
